name: Hugs & Kisses
description:
Made by Rat King for the bpb game jam 2018

Two players work together to fulfill all the needs of the community. Give them fish or bones, or love! Because if you neglect someone for too long, they might destroy the country you live in ...

Best played with gamepads:

  • Left Stick: Move
  • A: Take Food / Hug <3

Music: "Chillin Hard" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
